issue.title: [Packaging] Fix artifact name matching for conda forge packages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the recently introduced conda recipe changes and version pinning the artifact names are not known before the build, they contain a hash too.

`arrow-cpp-0.9.1.dev366-py36_0.tar.bz2` => `arrow-cpp-0.9.1.dev366-py36_vc14h12fa3ca_0.tar.bz2`

We need to either remove the pins or use pattern matching in the status and sign commands.
